bodyAttendance1._description: Request model for creating an attendance record for a session enrollment.
bodyAttendance1._id_description: The optional unique identifier of the attendance record. If not provided, one will be created.
bodyAttendance1._sessionEnrollmentId_description: The unique identifier of the session enrollment the attendance belongs to.
bodyAttendance1._isPresent_description: true if the user has been marked as present.

bodyAttendance2._description: Request model for updating an attendance record for a session enrollment.
bodyAttendance2._isPresent_description: true if the user has been marked as present.

bodyPostDepartment2._description: Request to create or update a department.
bodyPostDepartment2._name_description: The full name of the department.
bodyPostDepartment2.name: API Department
bodyPostDepartment2._useDepartmentContactDetails_description: If true, department contact details are used.
bodyPostDepartment2._externalId_description: The department unique identifier in the external system.

bodyResourceCategory1._description: Request to create a new resource category.
bodyResourceCategory1._id_description: The unique identifier to use for the resource category. If not supplied one will be created.
bodyResourceCategory1._parentId_description: The ID of the parent resource category (if any).

bodyResourceCategory2._description: The request to update a resource category.

bodyTags1._description: The request to create a tag.
bodyTags1._id_description: The unique identifier to use for the tag. If not supplied one will be created.

bodyTags2._description: The request body to update a tag.
